MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA5 postcode area of Johnstone. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have identified a grounded overhead line near to Low Bardrain and we now expect your supply to be restored by 9pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:45pm on Tuesday 23rd February 2021.
